She received a profit which she used to pay for her electrical bill, household expenses and school fees for her children. She dreams that one day she will be able to buy a business car. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "MBOGO” which totals two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to replenish her business with new inventory (crates of beer, soda, juices and water).

loans.name: Los Amigos Empresarios Group

texts.es: Roció tiene 30 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos dependiente. Ella se dedica a la compra por mayor de panes para luego expenderlos en horas de la mañana. En las tardes se dedica prestar servicios en un club campestre. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más panes. Su mayor deseo es implementar su panadería. Ella se siente satisfecha de poder participar en el grupo “LOS AMIGOS EMPRESARIOS” y a la vez agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Roció es la primera del lado derecho.
texts.en:
Roció is 30 years old and has a partner with two dependent children. Roció makes her living buying bread in bulk to then retail in the morning hours. In the afternoon, she spends her time working in a country club.. 

She will invest the loan in the purchase of more bread. Roció's greatest dream is to set up her own bakery. She feels content in being able to form part of the Los Amigos Empresarios group and she is also grateful to the Kiva loan lenders for the loan given. Roció is the first person on the right.

loans.use: to buy more bread.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer luchadora que vive en el Distrito de San Vicente. 
Tiene 5 hijos que son su orgullo, y que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación está sacando adelante.
Ella hace 2 años trabaja en los campos agrícolas de toda la zona de Cañete. Se levanta muy temprano para poder ir a trabajar y así tener más ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su vivienda.
Es una mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora cuyo objetivo es buscar el bienestar de sus hijos y que se conviertan en personas de bien.
Gloria estará eternamente agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que con el apoyo brindado ella podrá construir otro cuarto en su vivienda y así, poco a poco logrará cumplir su gran sueño: “Tener toda su casa construida”.
texts.en: Gloria is a hardworking woman who lives in the District of San Vicente. She has 5 children who are her pride, and who she is raising well with hard effort and care. She has been working in the farming fields around the whole area of Cañete. She gets up very early to go to work so that she has more income to cover the expenses of her house. She is a hardworking woman whose objective is to look for the well being of her children so they become good people. Gloria is eternally grateful to the Kiva lenders, because with the given help she will be able to build another room in her house and in this way, little by little she will fulfill her biggest dream: "To finish building her house".

loans.use: to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza, a 48-year-old resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines, operates a "Buko" business (more commonly known as a coconut business). She is married to Regino and together they manage their own household while operating the Buko business. They are working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses and to always meet the needs of their children who are all still studying at school.

Analiza buys coconut fruit that are native to the Philippines which are grown mostly in the South Region of Luzon. She also sells other Filipino fruit staples. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operations in her business, she is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of coconut to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. Analiza will also trade dried fish like "daing."

Analiza hopes that they will always have available stocks of coconut to sell and dreams that she, together with her family, will always find time for each other despite their busy schedules. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more stocks of coconut and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Margarita Del Carmen

texts.es:
Margarita de 44 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, es madre soltera se separó de su esposo por problemas personales.


Margarita se dedica a los oficios domésticos, pero también se dedica a la agricultura al  regresa del campo ella cuida unas sus gallinitas  que tiene. Desde muy pequeña el papá le enseño la agricultura ya que en la familia tenían que trabajar mucho para lograr el pan de cada día y ellos apoyaban al papá al trabajo; pero eso le sirvió de mucho ya que hoy en día ella se dedica a la agricultura de lleno. También hace tamales de elote y sale por las tardes a vender, ya tiene casi catorce años de dedicarse a vender tamales.

Con el préstamo anterior compro  los insumos agrícolas y el terreno donde cultivara para este año,  pero se le dio la oportunidad que un primo le dio una parcela para que junto a los hijos los cultivara para que sacara más cosechas y tuviera como defenderse y de este préstamo comprara los insumos agrícolas para esa otra parcela,  ella comprara 6 sacos de abono y un litro de herbicidas, esto le ayudara mucho porque hoy cultivaran más para salir con los hijos adelante.
texts.en:
Margarita is 44 years old and studied to the 9th grade, she is a single mother who separated from her husband due to personal problems.

Margarita spends her time performing household chores, but she also works in agriculture. When she gets backs from the fields, she tends to a few chickens that she owns. From a very young age Margarita's father showed her the ropes in the field of farming as her family had to work hard to gain their daily bread and they helped her father in his work. This was of great use as she now works in agriculture. Margarita also makes corn tamales, going to sell them in the afternoon, she has been selling tamales for almost fourteen years to date. 

With the previous loan she bought agricultural supplies and the plot of land when she would have grown this year, an opportunity arose in which a cousin gave her a plot of land so that together with her children they could tend to the crop to get more harvests and therein she would have what she needed to look after herself. With this loan, however, she will buy the agricultural supplies for this new plot of land; she will buy 6 bags of fertilizer and a liter of weed killer which will help her a lot as they are now growing more to get ahead in life with their children.

loans.use: to buy 6 bags of manure and one liter of weed killer, which will help her a lot as now they are growing more to help get ahead in life with her children.

loans.name: Anas

texts.en: Anas is 20 years old. He lives with his family which consists of his parents and 6 siblings. Anas is a university student majoring in Earth Science and Environment. He is in his second year, and he is planning to find a job in his field of study after graduation so that he can support his family financially. He is now seeking a loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Emelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines and she earns additional income by farming sugarcane and running a general store. Emelyn is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall.

Emelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 38 years old and married with one child who is in school. Janet works very hard to provide for them.

Janet runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Janet has been in this business for ten years and she sells a variety of items such as snack food, sardines, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Janet would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Herma

texts.en: Herma is 46 years old, married and the mother of two children. She works hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines and is requesting a loan for PHP 30,000 from NWTF to buy more items like rice, canned goods, cereals, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, etc. to sell. Herma has borrowed and repaid 24 loans from NWTF, has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income by electronic mobile retailing. She aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell during the peak season.

loans.name: Josué Amilcar

texts.es: Josué tiene 20 años de edad y habita en casa de su madre junto a su compañera de vida. Josué realiza trabajos de albañilería lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Josué desea construir un cuarto el cual por falta de recursos no ha logrado terminar. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, lámina galvanizada y polines para finalizar el cuarto y poder contar con mayor comodidad junto a su compañera de vida.
texts.en: Josué is 20 years old and lives with his life partner in his mother´s house. Josué works in construction which allows him to support his household. Josué wants to build a room which, for lack of resources, he hasn´t finished. For this he is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, sand, galvanized steel and mounts to finish the room and to be able to be more comfortable together with his life partner.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, galvinized steel and mounts to finish a room

loans.name: Uniendo Fuerzas Group

texts.es: Pedro tiene 58 años de edad es conviviente con hijos independientes. El  tiene una pequeña tienda al cual se dedica con el apoyo de su esposa y a la vez se dedica a la venta de uniformes escolares por temporadas. Años atrás se dedicaba a prestar servicios de chofer. Su mayor deseo es surgir en el negocio y adquirir un auto propio. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de mas abarrotes gaseosas y golosinas. Pedro cumple la función de secretario en el grupo “UNIENDO FUERZAS”. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Pedro es el que se encuentra parado.
texts.en:
Pedro is 58 years old and lives with his grown sons.  He has a small store that he runs with the help of his wife.  They sell school uniforms seasonally.  In the past he worked as a driver.  His biggest dream is to succeed in business and acquire his own car. 

He will invest the loan in the purchase of more candy, soda and groceries.   Pedro serves as the group secretary for Uniendo Fuerzas.  The group is grateful to the KIVA investors for the credit they provide.  Pedro is the one who is standing.  


Pedro tiene 58 años de edad es conviviente con hijos independientes. El  tiene una pequeña tienda al cual se dedica con el apoyo de su esposa y a la vez se dedica a la venta de uniformes escolares por temporadas. Años atrás se dedicaba a prestar servicios de chofer. Su mayor deseo es surgir en el negocio y adquirir un auto propio. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de mas abarrotes gaseosas y golosinas. Pedro cumple la función de secretario en el grupo “UNIENDO FUERZAS”. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Pedro es el que se encuentra parado.

loans.use: to buy more candy, soda and groceries.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza previously accessed a 25,000 PHP loan that she used to buy beauty products and hair products needed in her salon. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for a 40,000 PHP loan to buy beauty products and hair products needed in her salon. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Analiza dreams that her business will last longer and hopes to give her children a good education. She meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and hair products needed in her salon.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a hardworking entrepreneur who runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 30,000 from NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for three years, and earns additional income by selling fruits and vegetables. Juliet has sustained her business through her own efforts with help from the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en: Juvy is 49 years old, married and the mother of five children. She works hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines. She has  requested a loan for PHP 20,000 from NWTF to buy additional items to sell, such as coffee, cereals, milk, sugar, detergent, shampoo, etc. Juvy has borrowed and repaid ten loans from NWTF prior to this one. She has been running her general store for four years and also earns income from food vending. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 44 years old and married with six children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Helen has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials and gears for her fishing business.

Helen has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gears for her fishing business.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn works hard to support her family. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Jenelyn requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for three years.

In the future, Jenelyn would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: María Del Rosario

texts.es:
María de 47 años de edad, no estudio. Esta acompañada desde hace 29 años su pareja se dedica a la agricultura  y  al jornal  tuvieron en común 3 hijos todos con hogares aparte. 


María se dedica a la agricultura con su esposo desde hace 30 años. La actividad la aprendió de sus padres quienes desde muy pequeña le enseñaron pues fue la única forma en que pudo trabajar. 

Además de la agricultura también se dedica a la venta de leche y queso que vende en la misma comunidad donde vive. Para desempeñar su recorre diario un aproximado de 8 kilómetros al día para distribuir el producto y su horario de trabajo es 4 horas al día. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar una vaquilla para mejorar el ingreso por la venta de lácteos es decir leche y queso. 

El préstamo le permitirá que su negocio crezca y tenga mejores ingresos cunado adquiera la vaquilla. Esto permitirá  que tenga mejores ingresos con la venta  que haga.


Los sueños siguen siendo los mismos  como cuando estaba joven, los de salir adelante trabajando  y esforzándose,   para su familia sueña con que  ellos aunque están aparte logran sus sueños y ayudarlos en lo que puedan.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old and never went to school.  She has had a partner for 29 years and works in agriculture.  Together they have three children, all living in separate homes.

For 30 years Maria has worked in agriculture with her partner.  She learned this work from her parents who taught her since she was a small child, this being the only way that she could work.  Besides working in farming Maria works by selling milk and cheese in the community where she lives.  To carry out sales she travels about 8 kilometers every day distributing the products, and her work day lasts four hours. 

The loan she is seeking from CREDICAMPO is to buy a heifer in order to increase her income from sale of milk products, specifically milk and cheese.
The loan will let Maria increase her business and receive more income when she gets the heifer.  This will also provide her a larger income from the sales she makes.
 
Her dreams are the same as when she was a a young girl, to get ahead and make every effort so that her family members, although not with her, may fulfill their dreams, and to help them in whatever they are able to do.

loans.use: to buy a heifer so as to increase her income from sale of milk products, specifically milk and cheese

loans.name: Anabel

texts.es:
Los estilos modernos que ofrece Anabel son la estrategia esencial que atrae al público que visita su pequeña tienda en su hogar. En su local, se puede encontrar  tanto ropa nueva  como de segunda mano, también calzado. Además de vender, asesora a sus clientes para que adquieran las  piezas de acuerdo a su personalidad, estatura y peso. 
Su familia la apoya desde que empezó el negocio de ropa. Ellos forman un equipo  y ya  conocen el ritmo del negocio.  Por el momento no piensa abrir otras sucursales, lo que si planea es comprar nuevas prendas de vestir, asimismo, calzado, por lo que Anabel decidió solicitar un préstamo en KIVA MiCrédito. Solo a través de esta institución logrará conseguir el capital necesario y podrá atender las demandas de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The modern styles offered by Anabel are a key strategy which attracts the public that visit her small store in her home. In the premises you can find both new and second-hand clothes as well as footwear. In addition to selling, she advises her customers so that they buy items according to their personality, build and weight. 

Her family has been supporting her since she started the clothes business. They are a team and already know the pace of the business. For the moment, she is not thinking about opening other branches, what she is planning however, is to buy new clothes and footwear, hence why Anabel decided to seek a loan from KIVA MiCrédito. It is only through this institution that she will be able to obtain the necessary money and be able to meet her customers' demand.

loans.use: to buy new clothes and footwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more livestock in order to raise and sell them in the local markets.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan de 50 años de edad,  estudio hasta tercer grado de educación. Está casado su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar. Tienen cuatro hijos 2 de ellos son hogares aparte y dos viven con ellos una hembra y un barón,  el barón se dedica a la agricultura y la hembra aun estudia bachillerato  y está haciendo último año. 


Juan se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y frijol, se dedica a esta labor desde que era muy pequeño su padre le enseño a realizar la labor,  además de la agricultura el cliente es albañil es otra fuente de ingresos que tiene. Pero lo desempeña en temporadas no todo el tiempo. Pero a la actividad que más se dedica es a la agricultura ha sido la fuente por la cual ha sacado adelante a su familia y aun lo hace. 


El lugar de trabajo está a muy cerca de su casa.  Lo que más le cuesta es hacer llegar los insumos agrícolas pues el lugar hasta donde los va a traer está a 34 kilómetros,  lugar que tiene que recorrer en bus, el horario de trabajo es de 6 horas al día aproximadamente.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, semilla de maíz y frijol. El préstamo le ayudara a tener los insumos a tiempo para la siembra, pues la época agrícola ya comenzó, la necesidad a satisfacer será la tener en el tiempo justo el financiamiento para poder ejercer la actividad agrícola.


Los sueños de Juan con su negocio son poder sembrar el cultivo de maíz y frijol y tener un lugar donde pueda comercializarlo. Para generar un mejor ingreso con la venta de este.

Los sueños con su familia son que su hija logre estudiar una carrera universitaria,  pues ya está muy cerca de ingresar. Desea verla graduada.
texts.en:
Juan, 50 years old, studied until the third grade. He is married, and his partner is a homemaker. They have four children, two of whom live on their own and two of whom live with them, a son and a daughter. The son works in agriculture and the daughter is still completing her last year of high school.

Juan makes a living by planting maize and beans. He learned this activity from his father and he has done this work since he was very young. Apart from agriculture, Juan is a mason, which provides him with a second source of income. However, he does this work seasonally rather than full-time. The activity that he dedicates most of his time to is agriculture, which has provided the source of income that has helped his family to get ahead, and he still works in agriculture.

His place of work is very close to his home. The most difficult aspect is getting agricultural inputs to his field, because the place where he gets them is 34 kilometres away. He needs to get there by bus. He works approximately six hours a day.

He is requesting this loan from Credicampo in order to buy manure, fertilizers, and maize and bean seeds. The loan will help him to get the inputs in time for planting, since the planting season has already begun. He is trying to meet his need to get the funding to be able to engage in agricultural activities on time. 

Juan's dreams for his business are to be able to plant his maize and bean crops and to have a place where he can sell them. He would like to generate a better income by selling his crops. 

His dream for his family is that his daughter is able to study at university, since she is already so close to enrolling. He wants to see her graduate.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, and maize and bean seeds.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
This is Alicia, 41, a resident of Tondo Manila, Philippines. She is married to Nelson, her business partner, and is a mother of three children. She and her husband work together to effectively manage the household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Alicia operates a buy and sell business. What she basically does is buy shoes and other similar products at wholesale prices, and sell them per item with a little profit. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices. She also trade RTW and other dry good products for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 1000 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a 37,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities and varieties of products to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

Alicia dreams to become a successful businesswoman and hopes to send all her children to school and have them all finish their studies with flying colors. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, and also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her shoe selling business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing materials to sell.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en: Leonora is 60 years old, married and the mother of six children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, and has requested a loan for PHP 10,000 from NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Leonora has been in this business for the last year and also earns additional income by farming sugarcane. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is 53 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Lucena is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to purchase feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

Lucena has been raising pigs for 15 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is 58 years old and married. She has seven children.

Luzviminda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of items to sell in her general store.

Luzviminda has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns additional income from vegetable vending.

Luzviminda aspires to save enough money to be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Ronald Isaac

texts.es:
Todos los días a primera hora, Ronald sale en su motocicleta a ofrecer la mercadería que comercializa, desde productos de belleza, hasta productos escolares, entre otros. Es un joven dinámico y trabajador, tiene 22 años de edad y está casado. Hace cinco años inicio a vender productos de manera ambulante en su comunidad. La buena administración de su dinero le permitió costear  una motocicleta, por lo tanto ya no realiza los viajes en bus que le limitaban obtener más clientela. Uno de sus mayores soportes ha sido su hermano, quién lo motiva a triunfar.
Ronald solicita el crédito para incrementar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar maquillaje, peines, lapiceros, bisutería, entre otras cosas. El deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que anhela hacer crecer el negocio, aspira obtener nueva mercadería y nuevos clientes, de manera que eleve sus ganancias. Su sueño es brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, razón por la que día a día lucha. Una de sus metas es establecer un tramo en el mercado de su comunidad, espera poder invertir su dinero de manera correcta para lograrlo.
texts.en:
Every day first thing in the morning, Ronald goes out on his motorbike to put forward the merchandise that he sells - from beauty products to school stationery among others. He is a dynamic and hardworking youth, he is 22 years old and is married. Five years ago he started to sell products in the streets in his community. In correctly managing his money, he was able to pay for a motorbike, as such he no longer makes his journeys by bus which limited his customer base. One of his biggest supporters has been his brother who encouraged him to succeed. 

Ronald is seeking the loan to increase the output of his capital he needs to buy make-up, brushes, pencils and jewelry among others. He places his confidence in the funding as he dreams of growing the business; he hopes to obtain new goods and new customers and in this manner increase his profits. 

Ronald dreams of giving his family the best living conditions, which is why he fights from day to day. One of his goals is to set up a stand in the market of his community. He hopes to be able to invest his money wisely to achieve this.

loans.use: to buy make-up, brushes, pencils, and jewelry among other items.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 27 years old. He is single and lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt. Mohammad has been working as a dentist for four years at his dental clinic. He is now seeking a youth loan to improve his clinic by purchasing new tools such as an x-ray machine to enable him to do his work professionally.

loans.use: to purchase new tools such as an x-ray machine for his dental clinic.

loans.name: Ricardo Marilan

texts.es:
Ricardo de 60 años de edad, es agricultor está acompañado,  la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos,  tienen 4 hijos los cuales todos están con él y uno de ellos en la escuela.  

Ricardo se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 20 años de edad,  el padre le enseño este trabajo ya que él quería que el hijo aprendiera este oficio para que le sirviera cuando se acompañara y es así hoy  Ricardo solo de eso vive de la agricultura y por medio de esta ha sacado adelante a los hijos y espera que este que está estudiando pueda ser profesional en un futuro.  El trabajo de la agricultura le queda a una distancia de 20 minutos y él viaja a pie, le ayudan tres hijos a cultivar la tierra en un horario de las 6 am a las 12 del mediodía.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 5 sacos de abono, un litro de herbicidas para matar la mala hierba que el terreno lleva para el que maíz crezca en lo limpio.  

Los sueños de Ricardo, son seguir cultivando la tierra para que los hijos y a la esposa no les falte el alimento en la casa.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 60, is a farmer and is married. His wife takes care of the household chores and together they have four children who are all with him and one of them is at school.

Ricardo has been working in agriculture ever since he was 20 years old. His father taught him this trade as he wanted his son to learn the ropes so that it was of use when he got married and this is the case today. Ricardo lives solely off farming and it is through this mean that he has got his children ahead in life and he hopes that the one who is studying could become a true professional in the future. His work place is at 20 minutes away and Ricardo gets there by foot. Three children help him to tend to the land working from 6 am to midday.

The loan that Ricardo is seeking from Credicampo is to buy five bags of manure and a liter of weed killer to kill the weeds in the plot of land so that the corn can grow without weeds. 

Ricardo dreams of continue to farm the land so that his children and his wife do not want for food at home.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of manure and one liter of weed killer to kill the weeds in the plot of land so that the corn grows in a weed-free area.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis es soltero y vive en la Provincia de Imperial junto a su familia.
Este joven emprendedor trabaja desde hace 2 años en los campos agrícolas de uva de la zona de Cañete.
Asimismo estudia la Carrera de Computación en la Ciudad donde reside porque más adelante quiere trabajar en una empresa prestigiosa y tener mayores ingresos. 
Una de las metas de Luis es terminar sus estudios y convertirse en un gran profesional para apoyar a su familia y mejorar su nivel de vida.
Luis está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que con el apoyo brindado el podrá remodelar su casa y no solo cumplir uno de sus sueños, sino también el sueño de sus padres que es el de tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayor comodidad en su hogar.
texts.en:
Luis is single and lives in the province of Imperial with his family. This enterprising young man has been working for the last two years in the grape fields of the area of Cañete. He is also studying Computer Science in the city in which he lives because in the future he wants to work in a prestigious company and have a larger income.

One of Luis's goals is to finish his studies and become an outstanding professional to support his family and improve his standard of living. 

Luis is grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as with the help given he will be able to remodel his home and not only realize one of his dreams, but his parent's dream which is to have a better quality of life and greater comfort at home.

loans.use: to remodel his home.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
This is Thelma, age 67 and a resident of the municipality of GMA in Cavite, Philippines. She is a widow, and she has children. She, together with her children, manages the household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Thelma operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal in the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, 5 PHP worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Thelma earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling them by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her to continue the operation of her business, she is requesting a 25,000 PHP loan. She will be using the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Thelma hopes that her store will be bigger, and she dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Norma Guadalupe

texts.es: Norma tiene  37 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, su hija de 16 años y su hijo de 10 años de edad. Norma se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y productos de tienda desde hace cinco años. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para apoyar con la economía del hogar. Con el fin de mejorar su condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del piso de la vivienda para el cual necesita materiales como: cemento, arena, ladrillo y grava.
texts.en: Norma is 37 years old, and she lives in her own home with her life partner, her daughter is 16 years old and her son 10 years old. Norma has been making her living selling beauty products and store goods for the last five years. She is a very hardworking and responsible woman who does everything possible to support the family finances. Norma made the decision to seek this loan from Fusai with the aim of improving her living conditions to invest in the improvement of the floor of her home. To do so, she needs materials such as cement, sand, bricks and gravel.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and gravel to pave the floor of her home.

loans.name: Sulhiya

texts.ru: Сулхия добрая женщина. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем и имеет одного несовершеннолетнего ребенка. Сулхия занимается сельхоз бизнесом более чем год. Она выращивает рис. Сулхия работает упорно с раннего утра до позднего вечера. Она работает на поле, и знает, что это поле является кормильцем ее семьи. Сулхия в определенный период времени перерабатывает землю минеральными удобрениями. Она обратилась за займом в размере 3000 сомони для покупки минерального удобрения. Она ждут вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Sulhiya is a kind-hearted woman. She is 26 years old. She is married and has one underage child. Sulhiya has been working in agriculture for over one years. She grows rice. Sulhiya works hard from early morning to late evening. She works in the field, knowing that this field is supporting her family. When it is needed, Sulhiya treats her soil with mineral fertilizers. She has applied for a loan in the amount of 3,000 TJS to buy mineral fertilizers. She is counting on your kindness and hopes for your compassion.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers for her land.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
This is Jesusa, resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Ronnie and they have children. She together with her husband manages their household while operating the business. She and her husband are working hard to provide income for their everyday needs.

Jesusa maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics, and other products through the popular direct selling of brands like Avon, Fuller Life, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and other direct selling brands. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalogue, and these are the profits that provide dealers with their income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 2,000 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10, 000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional supplies and merchandise products like shampoo, cologne, deodorant, perfume, soap, fabric softener, undergarments, and other products needed in her business. 

Jesusa hopes to have more customers and connections. She dreams to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional supplies and merchandise products like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics needed in her business.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert used the previous loan to buy bread, sugar, and rice to sell in his shop. He is a 38-year-old married man with three children. The family is living in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

For six years he has been operating a retail shop, and transporting and selling milk, and with the income earned he has been able to provide for his family. He has the challenges of limited funds to meet consumer demands and low income. His dream is to become a wholesale trader and diversified sources of income. 

Robert is requesting a loan to buy general merchandise like Omo, maize flour, and cakes to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like Omo (detergent), maize flour,  and cakes to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of three children, Maria works hard to support her family.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from tailoring. Maria is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her food vending business.

Maria has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado de educación. Esta acompañado desde hace 5 años,  su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar tiene una hija la cual esta pequeña vive con ellos en casa. 


Roberto se dedica a la agricultura. Desde muy pequeño su padre le enseño la actividad pues no tuvo el padre de Roberto el dinero para proporcionarle educación hasta un nivel más alto

Roberto es un ejemplo en su comunidad,  ya que hace algunos años tuvo un accidente donde perdió uno de los miembros inferiores de su cuerpo; pero eso no ha sido problema para desempeñar la actividad de la agricultura. El lugar de trabajo está cerca de su casa, por lo no tiene problema en llegar y el horario de trabajo es de 5 horas aproximadamente al día.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar abonos,  herbicidas, foliares entre otros productos agrícolas necesarios para cultivar el maíz y el frijol.

Los sueños de él son  tener lo necesario para seguir trabajando en lo que aprendió y le gusta,  que es la agricultura para darle a su familia lo necesario para que salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Roberto is 32 years old, he studied to sixth grade and has been married for the last five years. His partner performs the household tasks and he has a daughter who is young and lives with them at home. Roberto makes his living in agriculture. From very early on his father taught him the trade as Roberto's father did not have the money to give him a greater level of education.

Roberto is a role model in his community as a few years ago he had an accident in which he lost one of his lower limbs but this has not been a problem for him in performing his work as a farmer. His workplace is near to his home which is why he doesn't have a problem getting there and he works approximately five hours a day.

The loan that he is seeking from Credicampo is to buy fertilizers, weed killer and foliar products among other agricultural products needed to grow corn and beans. Roberto dreams of having what he needs to continue working in what he learnt and enjoys, farming, to give his family what it needs to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, weed killer and foliar products among agricultural products needed to grow corn and beans.

loans.name: Jessica Marìa

texts.es:
Jessica es una joven emprendedora de 19 años y desde que era una niña sintió gran afinidad y gusto por todo lo relacionado con el área de belleza.
Ella empezó atrabajar en compañía de su tía (Lado Derecho Uniforme Azul) que tiene un salón de belleza. Hoy en día, Jessica se desempeña como una habilidosa estilista con experiencia en varios campos.
Ya que ella gana dinero por cada trabajo que realiza, siente que últimamente su desempeño se ha visto afectado por un secador de pelo que tiene en mal estado y hace que su trabajo sea más lento. Por esta razón ella solicita un auxilio económico para comprar un secador de cabello nuevo que le siga permitiendo embellecer a sus clientes, además desea comprar esmaltes de uñas y así ofrecer mayor variedad de colores.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener un gran salón de belleza administrado por ella misma aprovechando su experiencia y conocimiento.
texts.en:
Jessica is a young 19-year-old entrepreneur. Since she was young, she has felt a great love and fondness for everything related to beauty. She began working in her aunt's beauty salon (pictured of the right in a blue uniform). Now, Jessica works as a competent stylist with experience in various fields.

Since she earns money for each client she serves, she believes her recent earnings have been affected by her hair dryer, which is in bad condition, as it slows down her work. For this reason, she is applying for a loan in order to buy a new hair dryer that will allow her to serve her clients. She also wants to   buy nail polish so she can offer a greater variety of colors.  Her biggest dream is to be able to own a big beauty salon where she can take advantage of her experience and knowledge.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and buy nail polish in order to provide better service.

loans.name: Maen

texts.en:
Maen is 27 years old. He is was left with his mom to take responsibility for his two younger siblings when his father deceased. His mother is a teacher. 

Maen started his own business sewing clothes and doing embroidery for three years. This became a good source of income to support his family financially. Now he is seeking a youth loan to expand his business by opening a sewing workshop where he can raise his productivity and profit.

loans.use: To open his own sewing workshop

loans.name: Red Cross Road F Group

texts.en:
These twelve women from a small town in Churachandpur, Manipur, in the northeastern region of India, came together and formed a group called Red Cross Road (F) Group to uplift themselves and make their lives more comfortable and easy. They are all married and responsible persons in their families; hence, they know the basic requirements and needs of the family.

Hoizon is the featured profile member. She is pictured with her hand raised. She is 36 years old, happily married, and a mother to two teenage sons. Her husband is a carpenter by profession. Due to limited cash flow in the family and in order to supplement their income, Hoizon sells fruits and vegetables in the main market in the early morning and evening. 

From time to time, Hoizon weaves colorful traditional wraparound skirts and shawls to sell to retailers for more profit. After all the household chores are done, she wanted to continue weaving by extending her workday into the evening hours. However, the power supply is very irregular in Manipur. One has to pay an expensive amount to install prepaid electricity in the house. Hence, after sunset due to insufficient light, Hoizon could not continue her income-generating activities. Therefore, with the assistance of a Kiva loan, she wants to buy a 45 watt mini solar home lighting system, which will light up four lights bulbs for 12 hours a day. This will help her to increase her productivity and allow her business to operate during the night. Hoizon believes that a solar home lighting system is an excellent option to give in-house illumination in such an unelectrified area.

Likewise, the rest of the group members also need solar home lighting systems for their income-generating activities and family use. Some of the group members’ income-generating activities are a tea stall, weaving and vegetable vending.

loans.use: To buy a 45 watt mini solar home lighting system, which will light up four light bulbs for 12 hours a day and help her to weave for longer hours.

loans.name: Khayriniso

texts.ru: Эту 53-летнюю вдову с района Дангары зовут Хайринисо. Она трудолюбивая, щедрая и отзывчивая женщина. Хайринисо живет в районе с тремя сыновьями, двумя невестками и дочерью. Она вместе с сыновьями занимается куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Это у них семейный бизнес и единственный источник дохода. Они занимаются данным видом бизнеса на протяжении 4 лет. Хайринисо в данный момент обратилась за кредитом для увеличения поголовья скота, чтобы увеличить бюджет семьи. Она надеется, что ей окажут финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: This 53-year old widow from the Dangara Region is called Khayriniso. She is a hard-working, generous and thoughtful person. Khayriniso lives in the region together with her three sons, two daughters-in-law and one daughter. Together with her sons she buys and resells cattle. This family business is their sole source of income. They have been in this business for four years. At present Khayriniso has applied for a loan in order to  expand  her livestock and increase the family budget. She is hoping to obtain this financial support.

loans.use: to expand her livestock by buying calves.

loans.name: Petronia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Petronia works hard to support her family. She has a welding shop in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from a general store.

Petronia is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan funds to purchase additional equipment and tools for her welding shop business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream -- to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment and tools for her welding shop

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Mae works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store. In the future, Mae would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Maha

texts.en: Maha was born in 1974. She is married and the mother of three sons and daughters. Her husband serves in the military. Maha has been helping her husband pay their household expenses and cover their children's needs by sewing and making embroidery from home for 7 years. Her business started with one sewing machine. Now she is out of thread and raw materials that she needs for her business, and she is seeking a loan to buy them.

loans.use: To buy thread and the needed tools for her sewing business

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La perseverancia es la mayor virtud de Luz, una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que inicio vendiendo enchiladas y pan en su casa, con las ganancias obtenidas logró establecer una pequeña pulpería que poco a poco ha ido creciendo. Ella tiene 47 años de edad,  está soltera y tiene tres hijos, todos independientes. Hace tres años empezó en el mundo de los negocios, una de sus hijas ha sido su mano derecha y gracias a la calidad de atención que brindan, cada día ganan más clientela.
Ella solicita el crédito para aumentar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar granos básicos, así como arroz y frijoles; aceite, condimentos, productos lácteos, golosinas, gaseosas, entre otros. Luz deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que anhela elevar su inventario, para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y obtener mejores ingresos, que le permita obtener un futuro seguro y tranquilo. Una de sus metas establecer un tramo en el mercado de su comunidad y mejorar las condiciones de su hogar, construir ventanas y puertas más seguras.
texts.en:
Perseverance is Luz's biggest virtue. She is a hard-working, female entrepreneur  who began by selling enchiladas and bread in her home. With the earnings she obtained, she was able to open a small corner shop that has grown bit-by-bit. She is 47 years old. She is single and she has three independent children. Three years ago, she began working in the business world with one of her daughters as her right hand. Thanks to the quality of the service that they provide, they gain more clients each day. 

She is applying for a loan in order to increase her earnings, which requires purchase of basic grains, like rice and beans, oil, condiments, dairy products, candies, soda, among other things. Luz is confident that the loan will help her increase her inventory in order to meet her clients' needs and earn a larger income, which will enable her to have a safe and peaceful future. One of her goals in to establish a branch in the community market and improve the condition of her home by constructing safer windows and doors.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, such as rice and beans, oil, condiments, dairy products, candy, soda, among other things

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado de educación básica, está casado desde hace 36 años su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus hijos ya no están con ellos, ya todos están acompañados con hogares aparte,  con él solo vive una hija de crianza y una nieta.

Rigoberto es comerciante, tiene doce años de dedicarse a la venta de frutas y verduras de forma ambulante y cinco años de haber instalado su propia tienda, en su casa el trabajo de dedicarse al negocio lo aprendió solo,  decidió dedicarse a esto porque lo que genera la agricultura es poco, desarrolla su trabajo solo, va a vender todos los días por la mañana.

 El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar pan, aceite, arroz,  golosinas, azúcar, frijoles, detergentes, artículos para la higiene personal, etc. 


Dice que sus sueños son poner un puesto de venta de frutas en el mercado de su municipio para ya no tener que trasladarse tan retirado de su casa,  porque eso le genera más gasto y él ya se siente un poco cansado y espera que su familia aprenda a luchar y a trabajar para que en un futuro ellos puedan defenderse solos.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 54 years old. He studied through the sixth grade. He has been married for 36 years and  his wife works at home. Their children no longer live with them as they have families living in separate homes. He lives with a foster daughter and a granddaughter. 

Rigoberto is a businessman. He sold fruit and vegetables in the streets for 12 years. For  5 years, he has worked in his own store. En his case, he learned this trade on his own. He decided to work in it because he earns little money through agricultural work. He developed his business on his own and he works everyday in the morning. The loan that his is applying for is for the purchase of bread, oil, rice, candies, sugar, beans, detergent, personal hygiene products, etc. 

He says that his dream is to open a fruit stand in the municipal market so he doesn't have to commute so far from his home because this increases expenses and he feels a little bit tired. He hope his family learns to persevere and to work so they can support themselves in the future.

loans.use: to buy bread, oil, rice, candies, sugar, beans, detergent, personal hygiene products, etc.

loans.name: Salim

texts.ru:
Салим трудолюбивый и позитивный парень в возрасте 27 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Вместе со своей семьёй он живёт в маленьком кишлаке. Салим с юности научился ремеслу земледелию от своего отца. Всё своё детство он проводил на поле, помогая своё отцу ухаживать за посеянным урожаем.

И вот сейчас он сам занимается таким же делом, чтобы получать доход на пропитание и проживание. Он выращивает различную сельхозкультуру, а потом продаёт полученный урожай, получая от этого хороший доход. Для ведения своего бизнеса Салиму приходится много созваниваться с разными клиентами и другими людьми. Сейчас он хочет купить себе новый телефон, потому предыдущий его телефон сломался. Но в данный момент у Салима нет лишних денег для покупки телефона, поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку телефона. Салим заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Salim is a hardworking and positive man of 27. He is married and has two children. He and his family live in a small village. Since he was young, Salim has worked in agriculture, something he learned from his father. He spent his whole childhood in the fields helping his father work the land.

Now he himself works in the same occupation to earn a living. He grows various crops and then sells the harvest for a good income. To carry out his business, Salim needs to interact with numerous clients and other people. Now he wants to buy a new phone, since his old phone no longer works. But at the moment he doesn't have any money to spare; therefore he has turned to Arvand for a loan to buy a phone. He thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a new phone to support his farming business

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru:
Матлуба  замужем  и имеет  двоих детей, которые в настоящее время ходят в школу.
 Матлуба  трудолюбивая, позитивная женщина , которая очень любит своих детей. Матлуба содержит крупный рогатый скот и перерабатывая молоко она зарабатывает на то , чтобы помочь своей семье. После долгой холодной зимы запасы кормов , которые она делала закончились и с наступлением весны потребовалось приобрести дополнительно корма для содержания скота. Так как содержание скота и переработка молока являются основным источником дохода она не хотела бы продавать свой скот из-за нехватки кормов и потерять кормильца. Для приобретения необходимого количество кормов Матлубе необходим кредит за которым она и обратилась в "Арванд". Она заранее благодарит "Арванд" в поддержке.
texts.en:
Matluba is married with two school-aged children. She is a hardworking, positive woman who loves her children very much. She earns money to care for her family by keeping livestock and processing the milk. After the long, hard winter she has run out the feed stores she had saved up and she needs to buy additional feed to take care of her livestock. Since keeping the animals and selling the resulting dairy products is her primary source of income, she wouldn't want to sell her livestock due to a lack of feed and therefore lose her means of earning a living.

In order to get the necessary quantity of feed, Matluba needs a loan, for which she has turned to Arvand. She thanks them in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy feed for her livestock

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a resident of Tondo Manila, Philippines. She is 41 years old, and she is happily married to Ronald. God has blessed them with two loving children, and they are still studying. Life, indeed, is hard. But by the grace of God, they have been able to raise their children well, and they are helping each other in working for their family.

Veronica owns a variety store. This kind of small store can be owned by anyone in the community, and the store is connected to, or just inside, their house. This is where you can buy a sachet of shampoo or conditioner, a bar of soap, 5 PHP-worth of cooking oil, an egg, or other small items. She gets her products from a wholesaler at a low price; then she will sell them by the piece for a higher price, to have profit. Her regular customers are her neighbors, passerby and the people in the community. She earns PHP 1,000 a day.

To be able to expand her inventory, she is requesting a PHP 50,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages, to expand her product inventory. This loan will be a great help for her to add more products to her store.

Veronica dreams of owning a grocery store, and of her two children finishing their studies. She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.


*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages, to expand her inventory

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en:
This is Valeriana, 40, a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Allan, her business partner, and she is a mother to her children. Together with her husband, she manages their own household while operating a business. She is working hard, to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Valeriana is a dried fish vendor. She buys different kinds of dried fish from her suppliers, and then sells them in the market. Her store is located in a temporary fish market. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 in sales, every day.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 40,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy more dried fish, which she will sell in her business.

Valeriana dreams that her business will grow bigger and hopes that her children will finish their studies. She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God.


* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more dried fish needed in her business.

loans.name: Savlatmo

texts.ru: Савлатмо разведенная женщина в возрасте 36 лет. Она воспитывает двоих детей и обеспечивает свою семью сама. Савлатмо вот уже 5 лет как занимается продажей детской одежды. Ее торговая точка находится прямо на центральном рынке своего района Хамадони. Савлатмо оптом привозит одежды и продает их в своей точке по розничной цене. Сейчас она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы увеличить товарооборот. Она на сумму кредита собирается приобрести сезонную детскую одежду. Этот кредит важен ей для развития торговли.
texts.en: Savlatmo is a divorced woman of 36. She is raising and caring for her two children on her own. For five years, she has been working selling children's clothing. Her sales stall is located right in the central market of her region of Hamadoni. She buys clothing wholesale and then sells it at her stall at a higher price. Savlatmo is looking for a loan to increase her inventory. She plans to buy seasonal children's clothing with the money. This loan is very important for the development of her business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal children's clothing for resale

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru:
Наргиза добрая, отзывчивая, добропорядочная и ответственная женщина в возрасте 34 лет. Наргиза замужем и имеет 3 детей. Она живет в сельской местности и не имеет образования. Наргиза работает летом на поле в качестве наемного рабочего. Делает прополку и занимается поливными работами. Муж Наргизы тоже работает на поле наемным рабочим и их совместный доход едва хватает на то чтоб прокормить детей. 
Чтобы обеспечить себя и свою семью Наргиза занялась разведением скота, что и является основным источником ее дохода. Наргиза мечтает дать достойное образование своим детям, чтобы они смогли устроиться на хорошую работу и не жить в нужде и бедности как их родители. 
Наргиза обратилась  организацию Арванд за финансовой поддержкой, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота и расширить свой бизнес. Она заранее благодарна таким организациям как ООО МДО «Арванд» за поддержку малоимущих жителей сельских местностей и желает успехов в дальнейшем.
texts.en:
Nargiza is a kind, responsible and respectable woman of 34. She is married and has three children. She lives in a rural area and doesn't have an education. In the summertime, Nargiza works in the fields as a hired labourer doing weeding and irrigation work. Her husband also works as an agricultural labourer and their combined income barely suffices to feed their children. 

In order to take care of herself and her family, Nargiza raises livestock, a business that is the primary source of her income. She dreams of giving her children a good education so that they can get good jobs and not live in need and poverty like their parents. Nargiza has turned to Arvand for financial support to increase her head count of livestock and expand her business. She thanks organizations like Arvand in advance for their support of impoverished residents of rural areas and wishes them success in the future.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more women's clothes to resell

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулноре 26 лет. Она недавно стала матерью. Ее сыночку 6 месяцев. Гулнора вместе с мужем и ребенком живет в районе Хамадони. Ее муж занимается перевозкой товара. Гулнора тоже трудится. Она занимается разведением коров и бычков в течение 3 лет. Гулнора любит свое дело и желает расширить его. Она сумму кредита собирается закупить еще пару бычков для дальнейшего откорма и перепродажи. Она надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Gulnora is 26 and recently became a mother. Her son is six months old and she lives with him and her husband in the Hamadoni region. Her husband works in cargo transportation, and Gulnora works in animal husbandry, an occupation she's been in for three years. She loves her business and wants to expand it. She plans to use the loan amount to buy two more steers for fattening and resale. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy two steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta es madre soltera vive en casa de un familiar junto con su hijo de 4 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de golosinas: dulces, galletas, etc. en la entrada del parque que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mercadería por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y daré a su hijo lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: The client is a single mother who lives in the family home with her 4-year-old son. She works selling snacks: candy, cookies, etc. at the entrance to the park that is near her home; with her earnings from her sales, she manages to pay some household expenses. The client is asking for a loan to purchase merchandise in bulk to be able to continue with her work and give her son what he needs without any limitation.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in bulk: candy, cookies, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizer, herbicides etc.

loans.name: Isaac Antonio

texts.es: Isaac se dedica desde hace 32  años a la agricultura siembra maíz, frijol y maicillo, y esa así como se gana la vida honradamente, con su trabajo logra solventar cualquier gasto que se le presente en su hogar, Isaac vive con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposa y sus tres hijos, él quiere seguir con sus siembras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo pero no tiene de suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito y poder comprar los insumos necesarios como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y también mejorar el terreno donde hace su siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y asi poder seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Isaac has been working in agriculture for 32 years and grows corn, beans, sorghum, and this is how he makes an honorable living. His work permits him to pay for any household need that presents itself. He lives with his family made up of his wife and his three children. He wants to continue working the fields because it is the only source of income he has. However, he doesn't have enough money in order to continue in his work and so he is asking for a loan that will be used to purchase supplies like fertilizers, manure, plague control, herbicides and to also improve his land where he plants this crops. He is seen there in the photo. In this way, he will be able to continue to give his family all that they need.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers, manure, herbicides etc.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Maria de 62 años de edad vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia , ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno está en un lugar accesible, apto para el cultivo y con suelo fértil, todo lo que produce lo comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles, Maria es una mujer responsable y muy trabajadora, ella solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, herbicida, abono, herramienta, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía, ella  tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Maria, 62 years old, lives with her family in her own home. She works growing corn, and has worked in agriculture for a number of years and has had much valuable experience that allows her to always get better and better harvests. The land is in an accessible place, fit for cultivation and with fertile soil; all that she produces, she sells in all the areas of the community. She has many customers because the people know that everything she sells is high quality and at reasonable prices. Maria is a responsible and very hard-working woman. She asks for a loan from INTEGRAL which would permit her to purchase seeds, herbicides, manure, tools, etc. and improve the land that is shown in the photograph. She has good payment references and confirms that she will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time offer her family a full life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, herbicide, manure, tools, etc., and improve the land.

loans.name: Rosanna

texts.en:
Rosanna is 43 years old and married. She has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 12 years, and she earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

She has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan amount to buy more stock to sell, like canned goods, bread, cooking oil, noodles, milk, juice, and soft drinks. Rosanna has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF, before this loan.

Rosanna aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell, like canned goods, bread, and cooking oil

loans.name: Ricardo David

texts.es: David tiene 26 años de edad, los padres de David se divorciaron y él se quedo a vivir con madre y sus 2 hermanos que están estudiando, David solamente estudio hasta cuarto año de secundaria ya que las circunstancias  no le permitieron seguir estudiando, David se dedica 10 años a la agricultura, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y fungicidas para sus cultivos de arveja y quinua.
texts.en: David is 26 years old.  His parents are divorced and he continues to live with his mother and his two brothers, who are in school.   David only stayed in school till the fourth year of secondary school since circumstances then didn't allow him to continue as a student.  David has worked in agriculture for 10 years.  He will use the loan for purchase of fertilizer and fungicides for his pea and quinoa crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides

loans.name: Nadiegueton B Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  NADIEGUETON B sont des hommes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 44 ans, 4 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Flazambougou, un des villages de Sikasso, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
La spéculation cultivée est le maïs avec  Oumar debout en deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo; il  compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  3,5 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de Sikasso après la récolte à une clientèle composée essentiellement de revendeurs venant des grandes villes. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 600.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Nadiegueton B Group are married men who, on average, are 44 years old, have four children and all live in traditional families in Flazambougou, a village in Sikasso, Mali's third administrative region. These men work with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully complete their farming business during the rainy season.

The crop is corn, [grown] by Oumar, standing second from the right in the photo; with his loan, he plans to purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay the cost of labor to maintain 3.5 hectares. The crop [will be] sold in the village and in the Sikasso markets after the harvest, to a group of customers - mainly retailers - coming from the large towns.

Oumar expects to see an average profit of 600,000 CFA francs per crop. This profit will allow him to [re]pay his loan and also to help his large family with the day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Nadiegueton E Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  NADIEGUETON E sont des hommes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans, 3 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Flazambougou, un des villages de Sikasso, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
La spéculation cultivée est le maïs avec  Djibrile  debout en première position de la  gauche vers la  droite sur la photo; il  compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  2,5 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de Sikasso après la récolte à une clientèle composée essentiellement de revendeurs venant des grandes villes. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 450.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Nadiegueton E Group are married men who, on average, are 40 years old, have three children, and all live in traditional families in Flazambougou, a village in Sikasso, Mali's third administrative region. They work with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully complete their farming during the rainy season.

The crop to be grown is corn, by Djibrile, standing at far left in the photo; with his loan, he plans to purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay for the [necessary] labor to maintain 2.5 hectares. The crop [will be] sold in the village and in the markets in Sikasso after the harvest, primarily to retailers coming from the large towns.

Djibrile expects to see an average profit of 450,000 CFA francs per crop. This profit will allow him to [re]pay his loan and also help his large family with the day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Joel Alberto

texts.es: Joel se dedica desde hace varios años a realizar viajes por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, muchas personas lo buscan por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Joel esta solicitando  un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejores ganancias y dale a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Joel has worked for several years doing trips through the different colonies close to where he lives. Many people seek him out because of how responsible he is when driving. With what he gets from his work, he is able to take care of some expenses that come up in his household. Joel is asking for a loan to buy tires and for maintenance of his vehicle, which is his only source of work, to be able to earn more and to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tires and for maintenance of his vehicle

loans.name: Nadiegueton C Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  NADIEGUETON C sont des hommes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 5 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Flazambougou, un des villages de Sikasso, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
La spéculation cultivée est le maïs avec  Diakalia en position assise sur la photo; il  compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de Sikasso après la récolte à une clientèle composée essentiellement de revendeurs venant des grandes villes. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 200.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Nadiegueton C Group are married men who, on average, are 45 years old, have five children, and all live in traditional families in Flazambougou, a village in Sikasso, Mali's third administrative region. These men work with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully complete their farming during the rainy season.

The crop being grown is corn, by Diakalia, seated in the photo; with his loan, he plans to purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay the labor costs to maintain one hectare. The crop [will be] sold in the village and in the Sikasso markets after the harvest, to a group of customers, mainly retailers coming from the large towns.

Diakalia expects to see an average profit of 200,000 CFA francs per crop. This profit will allow him to [re]pay his loan and also help his large family with the day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Maria Felix

texts.es: Maria de 50 años de edad habita junto a su hijo de 24 años de edad en casa propia, Es una mujer que toda la vida ha trabajado con buenas aspiraciones, siendo muy emprendedora y trabajadora, siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer que ha dado la vida por su hijo. Maria tiene una pequeña tortillería ubicada en su hogar y gracias a Dios tiene clientes quienes la prefieren ya que maneja precios accesibles y es muy amable a la hora de vender. Maria desea invertir en la compra de insumos necesarios para seguir teniendo su tortillería por eso ha solicitado a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar maíz, manteca, aceite, volteadores etc.  Confía en Dios que su crédito llegara y seguirá dándole la oportunidad de tener una buena vida a ella y su hijo.
texts.en: Maria, 50 years old, lives with her 24-year-old son in her own house. She is a woman who has worked her whole live with good aspirations, being very enterprising and a hard-worker; she has always been characterized by being a woman who has given her life for her son.
