Maria has a small tortilla business located in her home and, thanks to God, has customers who prefer her because she has reasonable prices and is very friendly when selling. Maria wants to invest in the purchase of supplies needed to continue having her tortilla business and for this as asked INTEGRAL for a loan to purchase corn, butter, oil, turners, etc. She trusts in God that the loan will arrive and will continue giving her the opportunity for her and her son to have a good life.

loans.use: to purchase corn, butter, oil, turners, etc.

loans.name: Marlene Del Consuelo

texts.es: Marlene  es una señora divorciada, ella vive con sus tres hijos de los cuales 2 asisten al colegio y también vive con un cuñado que es huérfano, comenta que ella le da techo y comida y algunos gastos a este joven  y que también una tía de este chico le aporta mensualmente una cantidad de dinero para ayudarle con los demás gastos, Marlene se dedica a su negocio de ropa y productos de aseo personal, Marlene va a invertir el crédito en la compra de ropa y productos de aseo para incrementar y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Marlene is a divorced lady; she lives with her three children, two of whom attend secondary school, and also lives with a brother-in-law who is an orphan. She stated that she gives him a roof over his head, food, and pays some of this young man's expenses, and also that one of the boy's aunts gives him an amount of money monthly to help with the other costs. Marlene works in a clothing and personal products business. Marlene will invest the loan in the purchase of clothing and hygiene products to increase and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Nadiegueton D Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  NADIEGUETON D sont des hommes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 5 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Flazambougou, un des villages de Sikasso, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
La spéculation cultivée est le maïs avec  Mody  debout en deuxième position de la  gauche vers la  droite sur la photo; il  compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1,5 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village et à Sikasso après la récolte à une clientèle composée essentiellement de revendeurs venant des grandes villes. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 250.000 francs FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of Nadiegueton D Group are married men who, on average, are 43 years old, have five children, and all live in traditional families in Flazambougou, a village in Sikasso, Mali's third administrative region. They work with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to successfully complete their farming during the rainy season.

The crop to be grown is corn, by Mody, standing second from the left in the photo; with his loan, he plans to purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay for the labor [necessary] to maintain 1.5 hectares. The crop [will be] sold in the village and in Sikasso after the harvest to a group of customers, mainly retailers coming from the large towns.

Mody expects to see an average profit of 250,000 CFA francs per crop. This profit will allow him to [re]pay his loan and all help his large family with the day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs and seeds, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Andrés

texts.es:
Andrés de 65 años de edad,  estudio hasta tercer año de educación básica, hoy está acompañado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos  y al cuidado de animales de corral, procrearon 8 hijos, pero todos viven aparte con sus familias.

Andrés su negocio es la agricultura y la ganadería pues tiene tres vacas, es lo que a hecho toda su vida desde que era jovencito, pues fue lo que aprendió  de su familia ya que trabajaban el asocio, pues vale mencionar que las actividades económicas son las que ya se mencionaron, el trabajad ero está a unas cuatro 
cuadras de la casa, está relativamente cerca  lo hace a pie y trabaja unas cuatro horas diarias 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar dos vacas con la intención de tener una fuente de ingresos más vendiendo la leche, con ello estará mejorando su calidad de vida por tendrá los recursos para obtener otros productos y  se sentirá satisfecho. 

Su gran sueño es tomar leche de sus vacas que va a comprar y con su familia es trabajar para su esposa y apoyarla en sus emprendedurismos, ya que ella dispone de crianza de gallinas con el propósito de tener de donde echar manos cuando exista una necesidad, pero es claro todo esto lo lograra si es apoyado con el préstamo.
texts.en:
Andres is 65 years old and studied to the 3rd year of basic education. Today, he is married and his wife devotes herself to domestic chores and to caring for the animals in their corral. Together, they have had 8 children, all of whom now live apart with their own families.

Andres' business is connected with agriculture and cattle-raising. He now has 3 cows. Andres has done this throughout life since his youth. He learned the business from his family while working alongside them. Andres' present economic activities continue the same. He works some 4 blocks from where he lives. Since it is so close, he goes on foot and labors there at least 4 hours daily. 

The loan he is soliciting through CREDICAMPO is for purchasing 2 cows with the intention of having an additional source of income by selling their milk. With the new cows, he will begin to improve his quality of life. With these resources, allowing him to obtain other products, he will feel more satisfied.

Andres' great dream is to milk the new cows and with his family, to help his wife with her difficult enterprises. She wants to raise hens with the proposition of having something to turn to when the necessity exists. It is evident that all of this can be achieved with the aid of the loan.

loans.use: to buy two cows with the intention of having a source of income, selling the milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase supplies and pay for labor.

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José es un agricultor de 44 años de edad, toda su vida la ha dedicado al cultivo de jicama, solo logro estudiar hasta 1° grado en la escuela y ahora está acompañado y tiene una hija la cual aún vive con él. 

José posee 1,312.50 metros cuadrados de tierra que fueron heredadas por su padre antes de fallecer,  las cuales utiliza para realizar la siembra de jicama todos los años y este año no será la excepción él tenia ahorrados $700 para trabajar; pero no le alcanzan así que necesita su crédito para invertir $800 más.

El dinero de este préstamo será invertido en la compra de semillas, abono, foliar, herbicidas entre otros y además en la paga de las personas que contrata para que le ayuden a sembrar la jicama.

Para este año tiene planificado sembrar 1,312.50 metros cuadrados  a un tiempo un poco más anticipado de lo normal para que su jicama sea de las primeras en estar a la venta y así poder venderla a buen precio y sabe que lo puede lograr con la ayuda de su crédito que se le financiara.
texts.en:
José is a farmer and is 44 years old. He has spent his whole life growing jicama. He was only able to finish one year of grade school. He is now married and has a daughter who still lives with him. 
José has over 4000 square feet of land that he inherited from his father when he passed away. He uses the land to grow jicama every year and this year will be no exception. He has $700 saved to put into the harvest, but he can't finish without a loan of $800 more. 
The money will be used to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicide, and also to pay for the labor of the people he hires to help him harvest his crop. 
This year, he has planned to plant a large area of land a little sooner than usual so that his jicama will be one of the first on sale and he will be able to sell it for a good price. He knows he will be able to achieve this with the help of a Kiva loan.

loans.use: purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicides etc.

loans.name: Dimas Antonio

texts.es:
Dimas de 32 años de edad,  estudio hasta  9° grado de educación básica,  el motivo por el cual no siguió estudiando fue que tenía que trabajar,  porque su padre murió y le toco asumir el compromiso de sacar adelante dos hermanos menores, hoy en día está acompañado su esposa trabaja vendiendo frutas en canasto por las colonias para ayudar a llevar más recursos a la casa, su niña todavía no va a la escuela, le ayuda con el cuido de ella su suegra.

Dimas su trabajo es en la albañilería como ayudante,  pues tiene dos años de estar en este trabajo, antes trabajaba como ayudante de un Ing. Civil en la perforación de pozos,  pero debido a que el trabajo es un poco riesgoso quiso buscar otra manera de generar ingresos. Su trabajo hoy le queda más cerca, por lo que labora seis horas diarias, viajando a pie sin pagar transporte. 

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar un pick up, que le servirá para trasladarle todos los días la venta de frutas a su esposa, quien ya venderá en el mercado, con ello estará cumpliendo la necesidad más grande de tener un instrumento que le sirva para facilitar el cumplimiento a llegar a tiempo sin pagar mayores costos. 

El sueño de Dimas es ampliar el negocio de su esposa y que en el futuro no sea un pequeño negocio;  sino que una tienda completa para que en el futuro construir una casa, porque hoy viven junto con la mamá.
texts.en:
Dimas, 32 years old, studied up to 9th grade in primary education, and couldn't continue studying because he had to work, as his father died and he had to take on the responsibility of supporting his two younger siblings. These days, he accompanies his wife who works selling fruits in baskets throughout the neighborhoods to help her bring more resources to the household. His daughter doesn't go to school yet, and his mother-in-law helps with her care.

Dimas works as in construction as an assistant, and has done this work for two years. Before, he worked as an assistant to a civil engineer in digging wells, but since the work is a bit dangerous, he wanted to look for another way to generate income. His work today is closer, and he works six hours each day, travelling by foot without paying for transportation.

The loan that he is requesting from CREDICAMPO is to purchase a pick up, which will serve him to carry his wife's fruit to sell every day; she will sell in the market and in with this will meet the greater need of having a means that will serve to make it easier to arrive on time without paying higher costs.  

Dimas's dream is to expand his wife's business and that in the future it would not be a small business, rather a full store so that in the future they could build a house, since they now live with his mother.

loans.use: to purchase a pick-up which will serve to carry his wife's fruit to sell every day.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 25 años de edad se dedica a trabajar en su propia tierra cultivando maíz y frijol, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para poder mejorar su vivienda ya que con lo que obtiene no le alcanza para pode realizarlo, por esa razón se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar dicho crédito y asi comprar los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, hierro, balcones, laminas y pago de mano de obra y poder mejorar su vivienda, poner las puertas y ventanas así como muestra la fotografía y vivir junto con su familia cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: The client, 25 years old, works his own land, growing corn and beans; with his earnings from his sales, he manages to pay the expenses that come up in the household. He lives in his own house with his wife and their two children. The client is asking for a loan to be able to make improvements on the house since what he earns isn't enough to be able to do it; for this reason he approached INTEGRAL to ask for this loan and with it will purchase the needed materials such as cement, sand, iron, window  bars, metal sheeting, and to pay labor costs, and being able to improve his house, put in doors and windows as is shown in the photograph, and live with his family, comfortably and safely.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, window bars, metal sheeting and to pay labor costs

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 18 años y su hija de 15 años de edad. Ana se dedica a la venta de verduras desde hace 5 años  de forma ambulante. Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir una pila para almacenar el agua para lo cual necesita materiales como ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. Espera poder contar con este préstamo y así poder dar inicio a la construcción de la pila lo antes posible.
texts.en: Ana is 47 years old and lives in her own house with her 18-year-old son and 15-year-old daughter. She has worked for the past five years selling vegetables as a street vendor. She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who does everything that is at hand in order to give her family better living conditions. Ana asks for this loan from FUSAI since she wants to build a large basin to store water, for which she needs materials such as bricks, cement, sand and iron. She hopes to be able to have this loan and to be able to begin construction on the water basin as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, sand, and iron to construct a large water basin.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: Jose de 36 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable, honesto y humilde, con gran esfuerzo hace varios años empezó a trabajar en la agricultura sembrando maíz y frijol, hoy ha tenido buenos resultados ya que obtiene una buena cosecha que comercializa en los alrededores de la zona, posee mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y lo vende a buen precio, Jose  vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, el está solicitando a INTEGRAL un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra como lo son: abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. y también mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra en la fotografía y asi poder seguir con sus siembras y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose, 36, is a very hard-working, responsible, honest and humble man who with great effort has been working for various years in agriculture planting corn and beans.

Now he has had good results as he had good crops that he sells in the surrounding areas. He has many customers as his products are of very good quality and he sells them at a good price.

Jose lives with his family in his own house. He is asking INTEGRAL for a loan so that he can buy the supplies necessary for the plantings such as fertilizers, herbicides, pest controls, etc. He can also improve his land which he has shown in the photo. Through the improvements he can continue his plantings and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, pest controls and also improve his land.

loans.name: Sokheng

texts.en:
Sokheng is a 42-year-old woman, married, and a mother of four sons. She lives in a rural area in KamPong Cham Province. Her husband has been a farmer more than 30 years, and his rice field is located near his house. In order to support her family, she feeds many pigs to get meat and sells it in the local market in her village. The main source of her family income comes from selling the pigs that she takes care of and feeds regularly.

Sokheng is an honest client who was selected carefully by Hattha Kaksekar’s Credit Officer. Her main purpose of this loan is to buy animal food for her pigs, and the rest she will use to support her husband’s farming. Sokheng is thankful for this useful loan; with the hopefulness it can increase her family income. As it is the first loan for her, Sokheng is determined to pay back all the amount of money to Hattha Kaksekar on time.

loans.use: to buy animal food for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a pizza oven

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: Rowena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store. Rowena has been in this business for 30 years. She also earns income from food vending. Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Lesli Janeth

texts.es: Lesli, tiene 45 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos y vive con el esposo e hijos en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. Hace 3 años que decidió por tener su propio negocio y estableció una pulpería donde vende refrescos, dulces, embutidos, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, manteca, churros y otros productos de abarrotería. Para mantener el negocio ha solicitado el tercer ciclo de préstamo que es por 5,000 lempiras con el cual va surtir de productos nuevos como arroz, azúcar, harina, manteca, refrescos, churros, huevos, embutidos, y otros abarrotes que necesite. Con esta inversión va poder aumentar la clientela o mantenerla satisfecha. Su meta es Agrandar mas el negocio.
texts.en: Lesli, 45 years old, is married, has two children and lives with her husband and children in the municipality of Puerto Cortes. Three years ago, she decided to have her own business and opened a general store where she sells soft drinks, sweets, cold cuts, rice, beans, sugar, butter, churros and other groceries. To maintain her business, she has asked for the third loan cycle. The loan is for 5,000 lempiras, with which she will stock new products such as rice, sugar, flour, butter, soft drinks, churros, eggs, cold cuts and other groceries that she needs. With this investment, she will be able to increase her customer base or keep them satisfied. Her goal is to expand her business more.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, four, butter, soft drinks, churros, eggs, cold cuts, and other groceries that she needs to stock her business.

loans.name: Segundo Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo  vive en el campo, el es casado y tienen 2 hijos de los cuales, su hija es madre soltera y su hijo se encuentra estudiando en la universidad, Gerardo realizaba trabajos en el campo desde que tenia 13 años y con esta experiencia se dedico a sembrar productos como cebolla, arveja, tomate de arbol y otros, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y en el pago de mano de obra para sus cultivos, su aspiracion es que su hijo le de el orgullo de graduerse de la universidad y ayudar a los gastos de su hija y nieta.
texts.en: Gerardo lives in the country, he is married and they have 2 children, of which his daughter is a single mother and his son is a university student. Gerardo has worked in rural jobs since he was 13 years old and with this experience works growing crops such as onions, peas, tree tomatoes, and others. He will invest the loan in the purchase of manure and in paying labor costs for his crops. His aspiration is that his son gives him the pride of graduating from university and to help with his daughter's and granddaughter's expenses.

loans.use: to purchase manure and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Mwanapili

texts.en:
Mwanapili is a married woman with children, all of whom attend school. Mwanapili owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

Mwanapili has operated a vegetable stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces stiff competition from other vegetable operators in her business. With this 50,000 Kenyan shilling loan, she wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits, and green vegetables for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits, and green vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Sonely

texts.es:
Sonely es una joven luchadora, soltera y vive en el Distrito de Quilmana con su familia.
Le fascina cocinar, es por eso que actualmente está estudiando la carrera de Gastronomía en la zona donde reside. Ella sueña con terminar sus estudios, convertirse en una representante de la Gastronomía Peruana y llevar los platillos tan maravillosos que tiene nuestro país a otros lugares.
Es una joven muy emprendedora que también trabaja desde hace 1 año en los campos agrícolas de la Zona de Quilmana.
Con los ingresos obtenidos apoya a su familia y paga sus estudios de Gastronomía.
Sonely está agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que con la ayuda brindada ella podrá remodelar su vivienda y así ofrecer mayor comodidad a la familia y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Sonely is a single, young fighter, who lives in the district of Quilmana with her family.

She loves cooking and that's why she's studying culinary arts in the area where she lives. She dreams of finishing her studies and becoming a representative of Peruvian cuisine by taking the delicious dishes of her country to other places.

She's an enterprising youth who has also been working for a year in the agricultural fields of the Quilmana region.

With her income, she supports her family and pays her culinary arts studies.

Sonely is grateful to the Kiva lenders, for with their help she will be able to remodel her home, provide more comfort to her family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: remodel her house.

loans.name: Kong

texts.en:
Kong is 59 years old and married. She has four children, three of whom are married, and one still depends on her income. Kong started a farming business as her major source of income 20 years ago. She has learned this from her parents and older people. She also earns additional income from selling Khmer noodles in her village. Her husband shares responsibility for the family by providing construction service. 

Kong is requesting this as her second loan to buy construction supplies such as hand drilling machine, and other related materials and machines to help her husband in his business. With this loan, she is confident that she will increase more income to support her family's needs. She is very thankful to all lenders for the loan support through Hattha Kaksekar.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies and machines to help her husband in his business.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en: As a married parent of five children, Sabina works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Sabina is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials and gear for her fishing business. Sabina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gear for her fishing business.

loans.name: Luis Teofilo

texts.es: Luis es un señor colombiano que se dedica  a la ganadería y al jornal en el campo, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales uno de 2 años vive con Luis y los otros 3 viven con la mama,  pero Luis si se hace responsable de la mantención de sus hijos, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vacona para tenerla en un terreno por el que paga arriendo de la hierba, su aspiración es lograr que sus hijos tengan un buen futuro mediante el estudio.
texts.en:
Luis is a Colombian man who works with livestock and makes a living in the countryside. He has 4 children, one of whom is 2 years old and lives with Luis. The other 3 live with their mom, but Luis takes care of them. 

He is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow to keep on a plot of land to eat the grass. His aspiration is to make sure his children study in order to have a good future.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Diana

texts.en: Diana is a married woman and has kids. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She has operated a retail shop business for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.  With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, sweets, maize flour and wheat flour to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, sweets, maize flour and wheat flour to sell.

loans.name: Candelario Arcides

texts.es:
Candelario es un carnicero de 26 años de edad,  que solo logro estudiar hasta noveno grado en la escuela dado que sus padres ya no tenían la capacidad para seguir pagando sus estudios,  así que empezó a trabajar,  hoy en día trabaja en una carnicería vendiendo carne. está casado y tiene un hijo de tres años de edad, su pareja trabaja como enfermera en una clínica privada desde hace tres años.

La actividad realiza por el cliente es la venta de carnes,  ya que esta carnicería pertenece a su madre,  quienes mantienen el negocio familiar todos los días tiene que levantarse muy temprano para preparar la carne que será sacada al mercado para poner a su respectiva venta.  Esta actividad es realizada todos los días normalmente tiene un salario que su madre le paga es la cantidad de $20.°° diarios.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar laminas para el techo de su casa, ya estamos en temporada lluviosa y el techo de su casa tiene muchos agujeros por ende necesita cambiar todo el techo de su casa.  Él ha realizado un presupuesto el cual llega a $600 que son los que va invertir en su casa.

Candelario tiene un sueño en la vida, es poder tener una vivienda digna en la cual su hijo y su esposa puedan vivir sin tener miedo a que se puedan mojar por las lluvias y sabe que lo puede lograr y esto solo es posible con la ayuda de su crédito.
texts.en:
Candelario is a butcher 26 years old, who only managed to study in school until the ninth grade because his parents could no longer afford to continue paying his studies, so he started working. Nowadays, he works in a butcher shop selling meat. He is married and has a three year-old son. His wife has worked as a nurse in a private clinic for the last there years.
The activity performed by the client is selling meat, as this butcher shop belongs to his mother, who operates the family business. Every day he has to get up very early to prepare the meat that will be put out on the market for sale. This activity is performed daily. Usually his salary, that his mother pays him, is in the amount of $20.
The loan he is requesting is to buy sheets for the roof of his house. We are already in the rainy season and the roof of his house has so many holes in it that he needs to replace it entirely. He has made a budget of $600 to invest on the house.
Candelario has a dream in life: to have a decent home in which his son and his wife can live without fear of getting wet by the rain and knows he can achieved it, but this is only possible with the help of the loan.

loans.use: to buy building sheets for the roof of his house.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: Rowena is 27 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Rowena is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Rowena has been farming sugarcane for four years and also earns additional income from a general store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to buy more farmlands.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Keily Esmeralda

texts.es: Keily tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 6 años de edad. Ella se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo y su esposos es jornalero; juntos mantienen la economía del hogar y llevan el sustento a su hijo. Keily solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea repara el techo de la vivienda el cual actualmente es de teja y desea ponerle lámina ya que se encuentra deteriorado por causa del tiempo y las lluvias. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Keily is 22 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and her 6 year old child. She has earned her living for a long time by offering domestic services and her husband is a day laborer. Together they maintain the household economy and bring sustenance to their child. 

Keily asks for this loan from FUSAI since she wants to repair the rood of her house which is currently tile and she wants to put metal sheeting since it is deteriorating because of time and the rain. She hopes to be able to have this loan and to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheeting and wood to replace the roof on her house.

loans.name: Telesfora

texts.en: Telesfora works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a general store business in the Philippines. Telesfora requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for 21 years now. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business. Telesfora would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is 60 years old, and a widowed mother of five children. She is in the agriculture business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Gloria requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Gloria has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed 24 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Gloria would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is 56 years old and married with four children. Antonia works very hard to provide for them.

Antonia's business and family home was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Antonia has restarted her food vending business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Antonia has taken a PHP 7500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Antonia is committed to rebuild her devastated life and would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is 53 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Victoria is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Victoria has been in pig fattening for 12 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Eda

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children Eda works hard to support her family.

She has a general store in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig fattening and fishing. Eda is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Eda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to stock and sell.

loans.name: Prisca

texts.en: Prisca is married woman. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family. For the past five years, she has operated a food stall business, selling from home to local neighbors. She faces a major challenge of delayed payments. In the future, she dreams of expanding to a café business. With the KES 10,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice, maize flour, and sugar. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice, maize flour, and sugar.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es:
Adolfo es una agricultor, estudio hasta 6° grado en el centro educativo de su comunidad,  por motivos económicos no pudo seguir estudiando, actualmente está acompañado y tiene tres hijos de cuales dos de ellos ya están acompañados y el último aún vive con él y está estudiando.

Adolfo tiene alrededor de 10 años de dedicarse a la agricultura,  esta actividad fue heredada por  su padre quien le enseño a cultivar maíz y frijol, pero hace 5 años atrás un amigo le enseño la actividad de ganadería que es la compra y venta de ganado bovino y también la compra de ganado de repasto, ahora se dedica a dos actividades ganadería y agricultura y le va muy bien en ambas actividades.

El dinero de este préstamo será invertido en la compra de dos bueyes que necesita para hacer una actividad que se le llama arada de la tierra, que es cuando se raya la tierra para la siembra del cultivo del maíz que en esta actividad deja mucha ganancia, así comprara unos bueyes más grandes que los que tiene para trabajar y venderá los pequeños que ya tiene para comprar los grandes que necesita.

Él tiene planeado comprar unos bueyes más grandes,  para trabajar en la agricultura y trabajar para otros agricultores que necesitan sus servicios y sabe que lo puede lograr con la ayuda de su crédito.
texts.en:
Adolfo is a farmer. He studied up to the sixth grade in the community school. For economic reasons, he couldn't continue studying. Currently, he has a partner and three children, of whom two are already partnered and the other still lives with him since he is still a student. 

Adolfo has about 10 years of work experience in agriculture. This job was inherited from his father who taught him how to grow corn and beans, but five years ago, his friend showed him the job of livestock raising, which is the purchase and sale of cattle and also the purchase of livestock for grazing. Now he works in the two jobs of livestock raising and agriculture and both are going very well for him.

The money from this loan will be invested in the purchase of two oxen which he needs to do a task that is called plowing the land, that is when one makes furrows in the earth to plant the corn crop and in this job there is a lot of potential to earn money, so he will purchase two oxen larger that those he has in order to work and will sell the small ones that he already has in order to purchase the large ones that he needs.

He plans to purchase some larger oxen to work in agriculture and to work for other farmers who need his services and knows that he can achieve it with the help of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase two oxen to plow the land

loans.name: Maria Laurentina

texts.es: Maria tiene 33 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 de ellos están estudiando, Maria se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura, ella cría sus chanchos en un corral donde vive y paga arriendo pos la casa y el corral de sus chonchos, también cría vacas para obtener un ingreso mas y en ocasiones se va al jornal, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos, y con este negocio espera que nunca le falte para la alimentación y educación para sus hijos.
texts.en: Maria is 33 years old, and a single mother who has three children, two of whom are students. Maria works raising livestock and in agriculture. She raises her pigs in a pen where she lives and pays rent for the house and the pig pen, she also raises cows to earn additional income and sometimes she does day labor. She will invest the loan in the purchase of pigs and with this business she hopes never to lack in food or education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase pigs

loans.name: Kenia Suleima

texts.es: Kenia tiene 32 años de edad y es madre soltera de tres hijos de 12 años, 11 años y 4 años de edad. Kenia se dedica a la venta de tamales y pan dulce de forma ambulante. Gracias a su carisma y  experiencia  ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Kenia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para la construcción de una pila ya que la que posee se encuentra deteriorada y el agua se filtra. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena y pagará la mano de obra para la construcción de la misma.
texts.en: Kenia, 32, is a single mother of 3 children. She has a 12-year old, an 11-year old and a 4-year old. Kenia sells tamales and sweet breads on foot. Thanks to her charisma and experience, she has a growing clientele that prefers her product more and more. Kenia is requesting a loan from FUSAI to build an outdoor sink; the one she has is deteriorating and it leaks. With this loan, she'll buy cement, brick and sand, and pay for the manual labor needed to build it.

loans.use: buy cement, brick and sand, and to pay for the manual labor needed to build an outdoor sink.

loans.name: Nath

texts.en:
Nath is 30 years old. She has three children who are in school and depend on her income. Nath is in the agricultural business, farming rice and raising pigs in the Prey Chhor district of the Kampong Cham province. Nath is happy because her husband is very helpful and supportive of her. Despite their hardships, this couple can earn well for their family, and they aim to help their children in their future education. 

To further develop her current business, Nath is asking for a loan to buy 10 piglets for fattening. She hopes to sell them for a good profit when they are mature. In the future, Nath would like to save enough money to expand her business and to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy 10 piglets for fattening.

loans.name: Bernabina

texts.en:
Bernabina is 64 years old, married and a resident of Poblacion, Sibutad, Philippines. Her husband is a tricycle driver. They have five children who are already adults.  

Starting with capital of 3,000 PHP, she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefit given by the co-op. She became a member last April 2012 and has taken out three loans. 

Now she is applying for 14,900 PHP to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities. Bernabina wants to own a mini-mart someday, and will be fully satisfied if she sees her children own businesses also.

loans.use: to buy stock for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is 40 years old and married with five children. Four of her children are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Sally is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Sally has been raising pigs for ten years. She earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca works hard to support her family. Francisca is married and has a dry goods retail business in the Philippines.

Francisca requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more dry goods to sell to her customers.

Francisca has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Francisca would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dry goods to sell to her customers

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 58 years old and has five children. Edna is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Edna is in the agricultural business, farming corn in the Philippines. Edna requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Edna has been farming corn for 10 years and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Edna would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Connie

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Connie works hard to support her family.

Connie has a food production business in the Philippines, and also earns income from a general store. She is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Connie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal was born in 1960. She is a widow who was left with her only daughter to take care of. 

Nawal's family has a glassmaking workshop. That is where she came up with the idea for her business making and selling mirrors, borders and glass sinks. Her project was a good source of income that helped her cover her daughters' needs, and her family was providing her with the needed raw materials. 

Now she is seeking a loan to buy glue and paste machines that she needs for her business.

loans.use: To buy glue machines for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer among other things and to cultivate 875 square meters of corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goats in order to raise and sell them.

loans.name: Mwero

texts.en:
Mwero is a hardworking and enterprising woman who lives in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She is a married woman with one child.

Mwero sells goat meat to her neighbors and passersby. She cites seasonality as her major challenge.

With the loan, she wants to purchase more goats for her business. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for her business

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre emprendedor y vive en Nazca junto su esposa y su pequeño hijo.
Actualmente trabaja en una empresa minera y con el dinero obtenido cubre los gastos de su hogar.
Por otro lado Juan tiene una pequeña bodega. Sus vecinos afirman que es una persona muy amable y luchadora.
Sale muy temprano de casa para ir a trabajar, y por las tardes ayuda a su esposa en la bodega y juega con su hijo quien es su mayor orgullo.
Sin duda alguna Juan quiere sacar adelante a su familia, es por ello que se esfuerza al máximo para poder mejorar su nivel de vida.
Juan está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que con el apoyo brindado el podrá comprar mayores productos para suministrar su bodega y así ahorrar dinero y más adelante cumplir su más grande sueño: “Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Juan is an enterprising man who lives in Nazca with his wife and small child.

He currently works at a mining company and his income covers the household expenses.

On the side, Juan has a little store. His neighbors confirm that he is a kind person and a fighter.

He leaves his house early in the morning to go to work and in the afternoons he helps his wife at the store and plays with his son, who is his pride and joy.

Without a doubt, Juan wants to get ahead with his family and that's why he makes the greatest effort to improve his quality of life.

Juan is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their help. With this loan, he'll be able to buy more products to stock his store, and in turn, save money so he can reach his future goal of owning a house.

loans.use: buy products to stock up his store.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda, a 55-year-old resident of Tondo, Manila, Philippines, is a widow who works hard to provide for her everyday needs. In addition to her variety store, she operates a mini-coffee shop and offers Piso-Net (essentially a merge of PC and arcade rental services wherein customers can pay the services by inserting coins in the machine).

As mentioned above, Erlinda operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, five PHP-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns profit by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

Erlinda is requesting a PHP 12,000 loan to help her continue the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Erlinda dreams of having a supermarket someday. She desires to help her family all her life and to buy them a jeep. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week. There she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Marlen Suyapa

texts.es: Marlen, tiene 34 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijas, vive con su esposo en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Hace 5 años decidió poner su propio taller de sastrería donde confecciona cameras, forros para muebles, cortinas, almohadas y ropa en general. Este taller lo tiene en su casa. También su esposo tiene su propia barbería donde aporta al hogar. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 8,000 lempiras para comprar telas, zíper, elástico, hilos etc.  Para confeccionar prendas, cameras, cortinas y también va comprar ropa para vender. Su plan es trabajar para darle mejor vida a su familia y educación a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Marlen is 34 years old, she is married with two children and lives with her husband in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Barbara. 

Five years ago she decided to start her own tailoring business where she makes bed linen, furniture covers, curtains, pillows and clothing in general. She works from home. Her husband has his own barber’s shop which also supports the household.

She is asking for a loan of 8,000 lempiras to buy fabric, zippers, elastic and thread etc. to make clothing, bedlinen, curtains and also to buy clothes to sell. 

Her plan is to work to give her family a better life and an education for her daughters.

loans.use: To buy fabric, zips, elastic and thread to make clothing, bedlinen and curtains, and also to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Getrudi

texts.en:
Getrudi is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity, but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Gertrudi has operated a retail shop business for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business.

With the loan of KES 20,000 she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Ma. Teresa works hard to support her family.

Ma. Teresa has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns income from pig fattening. She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for her motorized tricycle.

Ma. Teresa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Fabiola Georgina

texts.es: Fabiola a su corta edad desea emprender un negocio de venta de ropa y agradece a Fodemi por darle este crédito y permitirle emprender su sueño, Fabiola tienen 19 años de edad, vive con sus padres que se dedican al jornal del trabajo en el campo, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería en ropa y comenta que le inspiro en este negocio ya que observa que una compañera  del colegio se dedicaba a este negocio y que le va muy bien, lo que Fabiola aspira es lograr que este sea un buen negocio y que sus ingresos le permitan ingresar  a la universidad ya que sus padres no tienen el dinero suficiente para cubrir los gatos que implican asistir a la universidad.
texts.en: At her young age, Fabiola wants to start a clothing business. She is requesting a loan from Fodemi to make her dream come true. Fabiola is 19 years old and lives with her parents who are day workers in the fields. With this loan, she will buy clothing. She says that she was inspired by a schoolmate who started her own clothing business and is successful. Fabiola aspires to run a good business and have an income that will allow her to go to university since her parents can't afford to cover the costs of her education.

loans.use: buy clothing.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is 33 years old and married with two children. Both of her children are in school.

Ailyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Ailyn has borrowed and repaid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twenty years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Ailyn aspires to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Matilde

texts.es: Matilde es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 de ellos se encuentran estudiando, Matilde se dedica 8 años a su salón de belleza,  dice que le va bien ya que da u buen servicio y con buenos productos a sus clientes, Matilde vive con sus hijos en el campo en la casa de su padre, ella comenta que tiene que trasladarse desde donde vive hacia la ciudad donde arrienda para que pueda funcionar su sala de belleza, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos para su negocio, lo que Matilde aspira es poner muy lindo a su negocio para que sea más llamativo y atraer a más clientes y que todo esto vaya en beneficio de sus hijos.
texts.en: Matilde is a single mother of four children. Three of her children are in school. Matilde has been running her beauty salon for eight years. She says her business is doing well and she provides her clients with good service and good products. Matilde and her children live in her father's house in the country. She says she has to get from the country to the city in order to manage her beauty salon. She will invest her loan in products for her business. Matilde aspires to make her place of business beautiful so it will stand out and attract more clients, and that by doing this it will benefit her children in the long run.

loans.use: buy beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy farming supplies to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Elsa Marina

texts.es:
Elsa Marina, tiene 57 años y actualmente cursa segundo semestre del programa de Auxiliar de Farmacia los días sábados, ella costea la totalidad de los gastos, incluyendo los valores de matrícula, que gracias a las facilidades de pago de la institución, ha podido mantenerse estudiando. Ella ingreso al programa de auxiliar de farmacia con la principal motivación que es ayudar a las personas aportando a que tengan una buena salud, principalmente los niños especiales, se decidió a estudiar en la institución debido a la atractiva oferta y a las ventajas del programa académico sobre otros del mismo nivel, Marina posee un promedio académico sobresaliente, que ha mantenido con esfuerzo y constancia, participando de manera activa del programa de formación. 
En este momento se encuentra bastante motivada con el inicio de la práctica, que permita a pesar de la edad vincularse de manera estable en una institución o formar el propio negocio, que le permita progresar y ayudar a las demás personas a mantener la buena salud. 
Ella necesita el convenio con kiva debido a las dificultades económicas que en este momento está pasando, ya que no cuenta con ningún apoyo para costear los gastos de matrícula y mantenimiento para el próximo semestre y ha usado todos los recursos en los primeros semestres.
texts.en:
Elsa Marina, is 57 years old and is currently enrolled in the second semester of the Pharmacy Assistant program on Saturdays. She pays all the costs, including tuition, and thanks to the payment plans of the institution, she has been able to keep studying. She joined the pharmacy assistant program with the main motivation of contributing to the good health of people, particularly special children.

She decided to study at this institution due to the attractive offer and the advantages of the academic program compared to programs of similar caliber. Marina has a GPA averaging A's, which she has achieved with effort and perseverance and by actively participating in the training program.

At this time she finds herself greatly motivated to start of the practical training, which despite her age will allow her to stably integrate herself into a company or even start her own business, which will allow her to progress and to help other people maintain good health.

She needs the agreement with Kiva due to the economic difficulties she is going through because she does not count with any support to cover tuition fees and maintenance for the next semester, since she had used up all her resources in the initial semesters.

loans.use: to pay a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Saraí

texts.es: Saraí tiene 42 años de edad y es una mujer con espíritu emprendedor quien con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia y además tiene un negocio de pupusas las cuales son muy demandadas por sus clientes y cada día son más las personas que buscan sus productos. Saraí desea construir un baño para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como ladrillo, cemento, arena,  grava y hierro dado que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en:
Saraí, age 42, is a woman with an enterprising spirit.  With great effort she has managed to establish a small store at her house.  She also has a ‘pupusa’ [stuffed tortillas] business.  They are in great demand by her customers, and more people look for her products every day.

Saraí wishes to build a bathroom.  In order to do so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy the needed materials like bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and iron.  This is because she does not have the resources needed for this expenditure.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and iron to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
Ramiro tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su conyuge y su menor hijo, en el Centro Poblado Inguer, una zona rural del distrito de Querocotillo, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, una comunidad tranquila, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Ramiro es la compra, cría y venta de ganado, tiene experiencia en este rubro desde hace 10 años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de ganado vacuno para ofrecerlo a un mayor precio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Ramiro is 34 years old. He lives with his wife and his young son in the small village of Inguer, a rural area of the Querocotillo district. It is a peaceful community that is dedicated to farming, trade, and raising livestock, and which is located in the province of Cutervo of the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Perú. 

Ramiro's livelihood is in the purchase, rearing, and sale of livestock, which he has been doing for 10 years. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative of $1,075 (3,000 PEN) to purchase cattle so that he can offer it at a higher price in order to generate more income for his family.

loans.use: purchase cattle so that he can offer it at a higher price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a new collection of clothes

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena works hard to support her family. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Lorena requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Lorena would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past three years, she has operated a food kiosk business, selling foodstuffs, maize flour, and cooking fat to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned seasonality as her major challenge. Rachael dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 15,000 she wants to purchase maize flour, rice, beans, sugar, and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, rice, beans, sugar, and cooking oil

loans.name: Jinky

texts.en:
Jinky is 27 years old and married with three children, who are all in school. Jinky works very hard to provide for them.

Jinky runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Jinky has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, soap, beverages and other groceries. 

In the future Jinky would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Henry Alexander

texts.es: Alexander es un joven muy arriesgado y trabajador, es casado y tiene una hija de 3 años, Comenta que su vida es bien sacrificada ya que para lograr comprar su carro  tuvo que sacar prestamos muy altos pero que trabaja todos los días y desde 5 de la mañana hasta 9 la noche para que le alcance pagar sus deudas, Alexander va a invertir el crédito en la compra de una carpa para su carro ya que los días que llueve es muy difícil que las personas ocupen su medio de transporte, Alexander vive con su esposa y su hija en una casa que paga arriendo,  Alexander aspira mejorar su servicio para quedar bien en sus cuotas para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Alexander is a very daring and hard-working young man, he is married and he has a three-year-old daughter. He mentions that he leads a life of sacrifice since he had to take out very high loans to be able to buy his car, but that he works everyday from 5:00 am until 9:00 pm so that he can repay his debts. 

Alexander is going to invest the loan by buying an awning for his car, because on the days where it rains, it is very difficult for people to use his means of transportation. 

Alexander lives with his wife and daughter in a house that they rent. Alexander hopes to improve his service in order to be in good standing with his loans and to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an awning.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials like cement and bricks in order to complete the building of his small house.

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es: Celia a sus 52 años de edad es una señora muy trabajadora, se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, con el crédito que le va a otorgar Fodemi va a comprar chanchos para mejorar su negocio,  su esposo trabaja en la cuadrilla (personas que se reúnen diariamente en lugar esperando que llegue alguien y les de trabajo), Celia comenta que aunque sus negocios sean pequeños ella les saca el mejor provecho posible, Celia tiene 6 hijos y  desea incrementar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y que su hija de 15 años siga adelante en sus estudios.
texts.en: Maria Cecilia, at 52 years old, is a very hard working woman. She raises small livestock for a living. With the loan granted to her by FODEMI, Maria is going to buy pigs to improve her business. Her husband works on a crew, which is formed by people who meet daily in one place to wait for someone who will give them work. Maria says that even though her businesses are small, she always gets the best advantage possible. She has 6 children and hopes to grow her business to improve her income. She also hopes that her 15-year-old daughter will continue getting ahead in her studies.

loans.use: buy pigs.

loans.name: Ola

texts.en: Ola is a conservative lady. So she asked her sister Ghadeer who is helping her with her business to take her place in the picture. Ola is 29 years old. She is married and a mother of one son and one daughter. Her husband is serving in the military. She has been running her own business at her house selling blankets and cosmetics for two years. Her business is the second source of income that helps her husband paying their household bills. Now Ola is seeking a youth loan to purchase clothes that might raise her profit and to expand the quantity of blankets she is selling hoping to raise her profit.

loans.use: To purchase clothes and blankets to sell

loans.name: Blanca Luisa

texts.es: Blanca tiene 46 años de edad, es una señora separada de su esposo debido al mal trato que él  le daba, Blanca tiene 3 hijos los está educando en la universidad, Blanca se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería y dice que con estas actividades puede sacar  adelante a sus hijos y no necesita de su ex marido, dice que le gusta mucho poder dar trabajo a sus vecinas ya que les paga para que le den ordeñando sus vacas, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca, su anhelo es que sus hijos le den el orgullo de que saquen su título universitario.
texts.en:
Blanca is 46 years old, she is a woman separated from her husband due to his abusiveness. Blanca has 3 sons whom she is educating in college. Blanca was worked in agriculture and livestock and says that these activities can raise her children and that she does not need her ex-husband.

She says she is very pleased to be able to pay her neighbors to milk her cows. She will invest the loan in buying a cow.
 
Her hope is to have her children give her the pride of getting their college degrees.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Segundo Juan

texts.es:
Segundo Juan tiene 47 años de edad, vive con su conyuge y sus cinco hijos, en el Centro Poblado Inguer, una zona rural del distrito de Querocotillo, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Segundo Juan es la venta de insumos de primera necesidad, así como brindar servicios de motocierra en corte de madera, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos para su motocierra y de esta manera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Segundo Juan is 47 years old. He lives with his wife and his five children in the small village of Inguer, a rural area of the Querocotillo district, a community that is dedicated to farming, trade, and ranching, and which is located in the Cutervo province of the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Perú. 

Segundo Juan sells basic necessities for a living, as well as offering power saw and wood cutting services. He has requested the loan from Edpyme Alternativa of $1,075 USD (3,000 PEN) to purchase replacement parts for the power saw in order to offer better service to his customers.

loans.use: purchase replacement parts for his power saw so that he can offer a good service.

loans.name: Dan

texts.en:
As a 53-year-old married man and a father of three children, Dan engages in agribusiness, farming rice and other seasonal products for a living. Dan works hard to provide for the family with help from his wife and children when they are free from school.

Dan would like to borrow USD 400 to purchase farm supplies like fertilizer and seeds, and to hire laborers to work on his farm. In the future, he hopes to continue developing his farming business, thereby increasing his yields and income.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies like fertilizer and seeds, and to hire laborers to work on his farm.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Merlinda works hard to support her family.

Merlinda has a tobacco retail business in the Philippines, and also earns income from farming sugarcane. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stock of tobacco to sell.

Merlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 26 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tobacco to sell.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter used the previous loan to buy more tea seedlings to plant. He owns a tea plantation, which he started five years ago with his personal savings. Business challenges include fluctuating price  and inadequate capital to purchase stock.  Peter needs this loan to buy more seedlings to plant tea.

His dream is to educate his children, build a permanent home, and buying land to grow crops.

loans.use: to buy seedlings to plant tea.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a 37-year-old married man with six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a motorcycle driver in the transport business. He uses the income collected to cater to his family's basic needs. He is a hardworking man, though poor roads affects his motorcycle transport business by wearing out the tires very quickly.

Patrick runs an additional business selling cocoa. He has been in cocoa sales for two years and dreams of buying cocoa land to improve his household income. He wants this loan to buy more cocoa for selling this peak season.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell to his customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy raw materials such as leather and decorative accessories.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is married with four children, three in school and one underage. They own a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

Rehema has operated a clothing sales business for the past three years. She sells in a shop to her fellow town dwellers and passersby. She faces a major challenge of inflation in her business. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a barber’s chair, a shelf, and work supplies like scissors, blades, and gel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more fabric for her sewing business and to buy detergents to resell

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
Mom is 49 years old and married with eight children. Her family lives in a village of the Sithor Kandal district of the Prey Veng province. She and her husband earn a living through selling snacks and vegetables. She can earn about 48,000 KHR per day. 

Mom is new to VisionFund this cycle. She is leading her group to ask for a loan. She wants to use her portion to buy snacks and vegetables to resell. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy snacks and vegetables to resell

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Anteriormente Luis trabajaba de chofer en una camioneta y debido a que es un señor que le gusta ahorrar su dinero pudo comprar hace 2 años  un carro para hacer carrera , Luis tiene 2 hijos de 11 y 15 años  de edad y asisten a la   escuela y al colegio, Luis vive arrendando y comenta que el crédito lo va a   invertir en la compra de llantas y en mantenimiento de su vehículo, Luis aspira que su negocio siga muy bien y en lo posible mejore ya es un señor muy prevenido y dice que se está preparando para cuando sus hijos vayan a la universidad poder cubrir los gastos de ellos y en la actualidad seguir pagando puntualmente las cuotas de sus créditos.
texts.en: In the past, Luis used to work as truck driver.  Since he is a man who likes to save his money, he was able to buy a truck for his profession after two years.  Luis has two children, 11 and 15, and they attend school and college.  Luis works for hire and says that he will invest the loan in buying tires and maintaining his vehicle.  Luis wishes for his business to continue to go well and when possible improve, since he is a cautious man.  He says that he is preparing for when his kids go to university to be able to cover their expenses, and  to continue paying his loan payments punctually right now.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Monica Narcisa

texts.es: Monica es madre soltera, tiene  5 hijos de los cuales 4 viven con ella y 2 de estos están estudiando, Monica trabaja cocinando los alimentos para los niños de una escuela  desde las 7 hasta las 11 de la mañana y el resto del día se dedica a la agricultura,  a la crianza de animales menores y también teje sacos, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono, fungicidas y pago de la mano de obra para cuidar sus cultivos, su aspiración es mejorar su negocio y que sus hijos sigan adelante en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Monica is a single mother.  She has five children, and four of them live with her.  Two of them go to school.  Monica works cooking food for children in a school.  She does that from 7 until 11 in the morning.  The rest of the day she works in agriculture and raising small animals.  She also knits bags.

She will use the loan to buy fertilizer and fungicides and to pay for the labor to care for her crops.

Her aspiration is to improve her business and for her children get ahead in their education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides.

loans.name: Carlos Vicente

texts.es: Carlos vive con sus padres y una hermana, el es un joven soltero y muy trabajador, se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y desea poner un galpón para que sea más apropiado y más rentable este negocio ya que actualmente cría pollos  en el campo al aire libre, también se dedica al jornal en la agricultura, el crédito lo va invertir en la compra de pollos y en adecuar un galpón para pollos, su mayor aspiración es  que su negocio mejore y en algún memento comprarse una pequeña casa.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young bachelor who lives with his parents and sister. He is very hardworking, and he raises small livestock for a living. Carlos hopes to build a chicken coop so that his business is more suitable and profitable as he currently raising his chickens in the open air. He also earns wages from farming. 

Carlos is going to invest the loan to buy chickens and to accommodate them with a shelter. His main aspiration is that his business improves and that at some point in the future, he will be able to buy himself a house.

loans.use: buy chickens.

loans.name: Nimia Rosa

texts.es: Rosa es madre soltera, tiene 7 hijos, de los cuales 4 están estudiando, 2 aun no entran a la escuela y uno de 15 años no pudo seguir sus estudios debido a la falta de recursos económicos de su madre, Rosa trabaja cocinando en una hacienda y ahí mismo le prestan un cuarto para que viva con sus hijos, también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, Rosa tiene una discapacidad en su pierna izquierda pero ella dice que esto no le impide trabajar y sacar adelante a sus hijos, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos para tenerlos en la hacienda donde trabaja, su aspiración es que nunca le falte el trabajo y mejorar su negocio no faltar el alimento a sus hijos.
texts.en: Rosa is a single mother. She has 7 children and 4 of them are in school. Two of them are not in school yet and a 15 year old couldn't stay in school because his mother lacked the resources. Rosa works as a cook at a farm. They give her a room there where she lives with her children. She also raises small animals. Rosa has a handicap in her left leg but she says that it doesn't stop her from working and getting her children ahead. She is going to invest the loan in buying pigs to keep at the farm where she works. Her goal is to never lack for work and to improve her business so her children won't lack food.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Benkadi 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe BENKADI 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 48 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des  familles traditionnelles à LANFIALA un village dans la commune de LOULOUNI dans la région de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt de campagne ( PC) avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec madame FATOUMATA assise au milieu sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI 1. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter, des semences, 3 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 3 bidons d’herbicide et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  0,75 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village et à SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  105 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d’autre part aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group BENKADI 1 are married women, who average 48 years of age and four children each. Most of the women live in traditional families in LANFIALA, a village in Commune de LOULOUNI, in Région de SIKASSO (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). 

The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their tenth farm loan with Soro Yiriwaso. The previous loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with Ms. FATOUMATA, who is sitting in the middle in the photo of this women’s group BENKADI 1. With this loan, she intends to purchase some seeds, three 50-kg sacks of fertilizer, and three containers of herbicide and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining 0.75 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women paying with cash or credit in the village and in SIKASSO. She plans on making an average profit of 105,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her in part to pay back the loan with interest, as well as to help out her husband in meeting day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, farm inputs, and seeds and to cover the cost of plowing

loans.name: Benkadi 2 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe BENKADI 2 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 48 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des  familles traditionnelles à LANFIALA un village dans la commune de LOULOUNI dans la région de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur dixième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec madame MARIAM débout à la deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI 2. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter, des semences, 1 sac de 50 kg d’engrais, 1 bidon d’herbicide et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  0,25 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  35 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d’autre part aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group BENKADI 2 are married women, who average 48 years of age and four children each. Most of the women live in traditional families in LANFIALA, a village in Commune de LOULOUNI, in Région de SIKASSO (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). 

The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their tenth farm loan with Soro Yiriwaso. The previous loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with Ms. MARIAM, who is standing second from the right in the photo in this women’s group BENKADI 2. With this loan, she intends to purchase some seeds, a 50-kg sack of fertilizer, and a container of herbicide and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining 0.25 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women paying with cash or credit in the village and at SIKASSO markets. She plans on making an average profit of 35,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her in part to pay back the loan with interest, as well as to help out her husband in meeting day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, farm inputs, and seeds and to cover the cost of plowing

loans.name: Roeurn

texts.en:
Roeurn is a 57-year-old married woman with 7 children. She lives with her husband in Kampong Cham Province. They are farmers and earn around  $ 4.00 per day. She and her husband have farmed for more than 20 years. They work in a nearby rice field. Their primary crop is rice, which is harvested and sold into the province's market every harvest season.
